definitions.text: leniency and compassion shown toward offenders by a person or agency charged with administering justice
examples: he threw himself on the mercy of the court

definitions.text: a disposition to be kind and forgiving
examples: in those days a wife had to depend on the mercifulness of her husband

definitions.text: something for which to be thankful
examples: it was a mercy we got out alive

definitions.text: alleviation of distress; showing great kindness toward the distressed
examples: distributing food and clothing to the flood victims was an act of mercy
